content.title: ABI Interpretation
content.definition: ABI ≤0.90 diagnostic of PAD. 0.91-0.99 borderline. >1.40 noncompressible (consider toe-brachial index).
content.statement: ABI Interpretation is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding ABI Interpretation helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of ABI Interpretation include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of ABI Interpretation.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
